lender.name: TJ A
lender.loan_because: I can and because they have a drive to work for their assistance.
lender.occupational_info: The only way to live

lender.name: Leann
lender.loan_because: I want to support others who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are having difficulty emotionally and feel sad, upset, or unhappy.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: I like to share.

lender.name: Abbey
lender.loan_because: I am only one person and Kiva has allowed me to be help others to my full potential.
lender.occupational_info: The students in my homeroom class have helped me raise money and we decide as a group who to donate to.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing can change the world.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: As a female entrepreneur, I enjoy the feeling of helping others get started on their own business dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I run a business the provides services to children with disabilities.

lender.name: Damtien
lender.loan_because: people have given me many gifts & I can share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the national government program in the U.S.A. that strives to make air, water and land safe from pollution.

lender.name: caroline
lender.loan_because: as a person who became (and still is) temporarily disabled. i learned how difficult it is to become a productive member of society again without help. it's practically impossible and it's not because we dont' want to...i live in a country that gives me the financial help i need to get my power back. i am now choosing to be the financial help my brothers and sisters need but don't receive from their governments.
lender.occupational_info: people who work in the spiritual and self growth or consciousness industries come to me and ask me to type up and design their website or newsletters for them.

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: we should all be helping those who need a hand and i'm happy to do whatever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the airport for the Australian government. I meet people from all over the world everyday.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Providing others with new opportunities that are empowering and mutually beneficial is one of the best things a person can do. Loaning through Kiva is one of the all to rare ways in which the provision of money yields these kinds of opportunities on a global scale. I loan because I want more for us all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional woodworker, instrument maker and antiques restorer. I am currently involved with the restoration of Trinity Cathedral in Columbia, South Carolina, here in the United States.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves through their small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Founder of PawPull LLC. The PawPull is the screen door handle for dogs.

lender.name: Valeta
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of giving. To give is one of the most selfless acts of kindness that we can share with the world. It takes minimal effort, yet the outcomes are always magnanimous.
lender.occupational_info: My degree is in Urban Affairs & Planning. I am still in the process of trying to jump start a career in this field. This degree will enable me to work on projects that will benefit the greater good of various communities. It is extremely fulfilling.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I want to help others pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a network operations center.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to provide support for others to become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Debbie G Cook
lender.loan_because: I am my brothers/sisters keeper!

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I can't change the world, but I can at least try to help one who tries and truly deserve a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help. And because I am lucky enough to be able to and I want to spread that luck around a little.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about women giving it a go. I like to support businesses related to textiles, food,, housing, and health.
lender.occupational_info: I am just a mum who appreciates the basic things in life, and want the best for future generations.

lender.name: alice
lender.loan_because: I believe in personal initiative to lift yourself out of hard circumstances and I believe in supporting this initiative as a pay back (or pay it forward!).

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: While my resources are limited, Kiva gives me an opportunity to help others around the world.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva.org offers a wonderful way to help people find empowerment and stability in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children with special needs... hopefully, empowering them through education!

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I am able to and because it is sincerely humbling and rewarding to be a small part of something that is a lot larger than even my own personal ambitions. Ultimately , I choose to loan simply because I want to help those that are asking for help.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I would say that I am professionally at the moment working on behalf of a automotive manufacturer in consumer protection matters. Looking towards the future(if the Yankees front office doesn't call on my services of course), just like you, I want to earn a living doing something I love!

lender.name: BobSongs
lender.loan_because: I have had an abundance of blessings in my life. And I believe in the words of Jim Henson... 'I would like to leave the world a little better, when I am gone, than when I got here !'
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer geek... unless I am doing something else, and then I am just a geek.

lender.name: Cezar
lender.loan_because: I want a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find better jobs in their own country or abroad.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: ... i think people building their own business are great people.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have started a group to bring recognition to charities, applications that donate to charities, as well as online social change. I believe every single person makes a difference. I hope to make a difference.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: this way of support lets people keep their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I try to find out how to support preschool children with a migration background in a better way to learn the language of the country they live in.

lender.name: inge
lender.loan_because: I live in a country, where everyone has a chance for a good life. Therefore i like to help persons, which are not so lucky!

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I want to empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage college students to get involved in their local community.

lender.name: Frode
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic way of helping people; I love this concept.
lender.occupational_info:
Working within the IT and telecommunications sector.
As a hobby I write and make movies.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and want to help others succeed in small businesses of their own.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer consultant and specialize in multimedia for the web. I am a videographer and film maker as well.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: A hand up is always better than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses and land

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: someone gets hope through it

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: to help small business

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: I am aware of world poverty, especially in rural Africa. I understand the needs of impoverished women and men that can't access traditional banks and I know the power of capital in the hands of bright entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am the CEO and founder of ICAfrica. What I do is find and provide to impoverished people in Africa, essential resources that will help them improve their lives and lives of others within their communities.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: I think helping people to get back on their feet is a better way to help than giving them a loaf of bread. And why not help if I can?
lender.occupational_info: I listen to people, and try to find a solution to their problems in the IT and business area.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: We are not blessed because we are somehow wonderful or otherwise deserving...we are blessed to BE a blessing!
lender.occupational_info: I provide lifestyle management services to individuals who need help managing their busy lives.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a medical doctor.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing goes to the people who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I help government and companies keep their information assets secure.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I see my life as privileged. There are time when I have to struggle, but it is never as bad as it could be, nor as bad for me as it is for someone else. I loan because I spend money on frivialous things for my pleasure, and in order to keep my energies good I need to give to those who are in need. I loan because it is empowering and nothing is better than feeling and knowing you CAN do whatever you need or want to do with your life. I loan because it feels good to give back to someone, or some cause, that is greater than myself.
lender.occupational_info:
I have many jobs... My first is as a Leasing Consultant. I rent apartment homes to people in the Philadelphia, PA area. My second is a Personal Assistant and Lifestyle Manager. This is a great job! I get to be involved with people's personal and professional lives by creating organizational freedom, time management abilities, and healthy lifestyle options for them.
The third, is a wholesale fine jewelry representative. I sell a line of Silve, Gold, Murano Glass, and Crystal Jewelry to Fine Jewlery and Gift Stores in PA, NJ, and OH.
And, once a week, a take a couple of hours to clean houses. It is a good supplemental income, I love to clean, and it feels great to provide these people, my clients, with a clean and clutter free home.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of microfinancing and it feels good to give.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I want to help people with good intentions who are sincere and serious about obtaining their goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: I repair cars and trucks for a Chrysler dealer.

lender.name: Leon
lender.loan_because: We can help!!! Start-Up

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I write software tools for Astronomers.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of community
lender.occupational_info: I'm a social worker, therapist, writer and artist.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can, and I like the idea of enabling enterprising people create a better life through their own initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I am a natural resources geologist working to conserve water and soil resources and to improve the environment.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's good to help people, help themselves.

lender.name: Peter en Roely
lender.loan_because: we are able to and it's very direct and personal

lender.name: Gisle
lender.loan_because: I want to help and liked this consept

lender.name: Martin
lender.occupational_info: IT professional

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I felt led to by my God: the God of Israel and the one Lord Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I calculate how much people should pay for life insurance.

lender.name: Jasper
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance department of an investment bank in London.

lender.name: Srinivas
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to the aspirations of the small scale enterprenuers by assisting them to raise the finance to carry out their buisiness plan and at the same time get good return on my money invested.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I know how much of a difference a relatively small amount of capital can make to the success of a small business.
lender.occupational_info: We support Apple Macintosh Computers

lender.name: G Monkie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and should help others.
lender.occupational_info: We are building a modern green new media company called G Living. The worlds first G/Publishing Social Network.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!!!!

lender.name: John-Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that micro loans can make a difference in the lives of small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: Graduate student in Art.

lender.name: Arthur Lui
lender.loan_because:
I'm an entrepreneur myself and want to support others in creating thriving businesses and pulling themselves out of poverty.
Buy five Starbucks coffees or help an entrepreneur? Hard decision.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others-- in some small way-- to improve their quality of life and fulfill their aspirations
lender.occupational_info: For the last 2 years, I've been researching legal issues, reviewing evidence, and writing first drafts of letters to clients. I will take the bar exam in late July, and if I pass, I will be a lawyer.

lender.name: Sandra & Rex Meyer
lender.loan_because: People are in great need all over this earth! We give because we want them to be self sufficient and successful.

lender.name: DougP
lender.loan_because: People are the same every where, we all want the best for our families. KIVA makes it possible to add to the lives of people seeking that better life!

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: it is one of the ways I try to end poverty in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and History to 13-year-old boys and girls.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to help in any way that I can however small. I don't have much, but I can share what I have.

lender.name: bruce mansour
lender.loan_because: We make a living what we get, we make a life from what we give :)
lender.occupational_info: I create and manage special events

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: What better way to use my money than to help others committed to helping their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work too much!

lender.name: ANT
lender.loan_because: people are important.
lender.occupational_info: I tell jokes for a living.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: A competitor once helped me through a stressful time and asked nothing in return except that I help those in need when I have the chance.....and now I do.
lender.occupational_info: I now undertake charity work in the areas of childhood cancer and homeless youth.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to help people. I came from hard times, and people helped me, so now I try and give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit health care agency, and oversee several group homes for people with Mental Retardation and Mental Illness, and try and make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Matt and Andrea
lender.loan_because: We believe it is the best way to make a long-term difference in lives we will never see.
lender.occupational_info: Matt is a math teacher to 10th-grade students and Andrea is a youth pastor. We both are getting our Master's degrees

lender.name: JUSTINE
lender.loan_because: i really need a personal computer to start a desktop publishing shop and be able to provide my own needs thru a small scale business and also help other lowly income earners like me.
lender.occupational_info: promote positive advertisements to other individuals and help overcome poverty

lender.name: Christiansen Family
lender.loan_because: My daughter and I know the world is a beautiful place, and we believe in supporting others to make all our lives better.

lender.name: Shreekar Ranade
lender.loan_because: Helping people become self reliant is the best way to improve the lives of human beings all over the world. A small loan goes a long way rather than a free gift - 'teach them how to catch fish' is the best mantra...
lender.occupational_info: I design and manage systems and processes that enable businesses to operate efficiently. I am passionate about technology and the interaction of humans with technology.

lender.name: Ed & Karen
lender.loan_because: We would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Ed Cooks, I serve and everyone eats!

lender.name: Vicky and Nicole
lender.loan_because: we can and we want to help you reach your dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Electronic Sales

lender.name: Cristi
lender.loan_because: God has richly blessed us with many things and we are fortunate enough to be able to help others.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: I want to see these businesswoman succeed in their chosen business.

lender.name: Wes And Susi Bean
lender.loan_because: small actions can make a big difference

lender.name: mike
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have severe handicapping conditions such as autism or mental retardation.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: everyone, regardless of means, deserves a chance to happiness

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Sometimes a little can mean a lot.
lender.occupational_info: Preparing for, and responding to, disasters.

lender.name: mandy
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way to promote wealth is to support others in their business plans
lender.occupational_info: I but houses that are being foreclosed on.

lender.name: Scott and Mary
lender.loan_because: Improving lives is our moral imperative.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that represents biotechnology and life sciences companies in California. Mary is an amazing first grade teacher.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: It's something even I can do to change the world!
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell jewelry and accessories.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for children.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: helping others in business is a great way to create real wealth and promote self etsteem and confidence from which everything is possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a company that looks for oil and gas in the US so that we can help America meet its energy needs.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I live a good life and am presently in a position to help others as I have been helped in the past. Lending through Kiva seems to be the best way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for builds custom homes. My job is to run the project and co-ordinate the schedule, the trades that are needed and the materials.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because:
I take money for granted, and I know these people won't
"Dedicate (donate, give all) your life to something larger than yourself and your pleasure -- to relieving suffering... happiness lies this way, and it beats pleasure hollow." -- Annie Dillard

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: Helping people and companies achieving goals

lender.name: Miku Mikami
lender.loan_because: I want to help people everywhere!

lender.name: Henrik W
lender.loan_because: I find microfinancing to be the best way to help people short of travelling to them and helping them directly.

lender.name: Buikgevoel
lender.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to support each other.
lender.occupational_info: As a kid, I lived in Africa and I am glad I can make a small difference for the people there by these loans!

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: I would like to help women around the world to be financially and intellectually independent.
lender.occupational_info: I try organizing the perfect environment for scientists so that they can do the best research possible.

lender.name: Sere & J√∏ran
lender.loan_because: We want to make contributions to try help entrepreneurs build self-sustainable businesses, which can support them and their families for the future.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in the developing world and because I feel that good business is where you find.
lender.occupational_info: Import and Export

lender.name: Connor
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to pass that blessing along to others in Jesus' name!
lender.occupational_info: I want to tell everyone the good news about Jesus Christ!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to end poverty and world hunger.

lender.name: Pacifica Fog & Wine
lender.loan_because: we are inspired to do a little more. We feel blessed in our everyday life and want to do our part.

lender.name: Joep Vanlier
lender.loan_because: I strongly respect your efforts towards a better quality of life and I wish to support your cause.
lender.occupational_info: Scientific apprentice.

lender.name: Michael MinKhin
lender.loan_because: my brother turned me on to Kiva and I am able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I always try to engage in work that is fun and challenging. Monetary rewards are satisfying but secondary.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Adding value and enabling people in developing countries affords them economic independence and gives me fulfillment.

lender.name: vicky
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We are one world, and we are in this together. Without a person to reach out a hand (to give or receive) where would we be? I also want to set an example for my grandchildren.
lender.occupational_info: I care for children while their parents work at other businesses

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I believe that by investing in grassroots projects and independent businesses you give people the power and autonomy to help themselves, build a better future, and not rely on charity, which all too often undermines self belief and perpetuates poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I travel as much as I can and write about the places I visit and the people I meet for a range of websites, magazines and newspapers in the UK.

lender.name: Rev. Julie
lender.loan_because: Helping others is a way of life...at home and globally.
lender.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a rural church that provides a food pantry and a women's shelter for our community. I also take members of my church on mission trips: we have been to Kenya to help with the Rafiki AIDS Orphanage in Kikuyu, Kenya and gave a scholarship for a student to complete her vocational training.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: KIVA is an organization i feel good about supporting and I know that the money is really helping people earn their living.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.occupational_info: Economic Development

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupational_info: I allow people to communicate and find each other on the internet.

lender.name: Bryan and Stacie
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to help someone succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Manage people and money.

lender.name: Michelle F
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: we can only achieve greatness for our children by giving.
lender.occupational_info: i work in an inner-city Emergency Department which is also a Level-One Trauma Center.

lender.name: InukShuk
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Prince & Shikha
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to be able to make a difference to somebody else's life.

lender.name: Wilka
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Santy
lender.loan_because: I would like to make others‚Äô lives better and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: it makes the world a better place

lender.name: JasonC
lender.loan_because:
I was inspired by Muhammad Yunus' story and encouraged by his most recent book "A World Without Poverty".
"If I could be useful to another human being, even for a day, that would be a great thing." M. Yunus

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I help others become successful online as an internet marketer at http://steamdrivenmedia.com

lender.name: Thierry
lender.loan_because:
I live in a situation and a place where I can do it. Because I believe that helping those who have less resources is right. Because I think it's the right thing to do. Because I'd like someone to trust me if I was in their position.
Because I'm a "human being" in it's wide acceptance, and I embrace it.
lender.occupational_info: My day job is related to computer. I'm a DBA (database administrator). On my free time, I enjoy playing with my daughter, spending quality time with my wife, riding my motorbike, and programming small and mostly futile programs. It's so much fun...

lender.name: Sahayak
lender.loan_because: To be of service to those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I have over 10 years experience in raising funds through community and business activities for NFP's. We am currently travelling and performing our music for an extended period overseas.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I care about others in need.

lender.name: janek
lender.loan_because: though i don't know if this is a right thing, i just want to do things right

lender.name: BayouBhoy (Steve)
lender.loan_because: I was on the receiving end of a tremendous amount of charity following Hurricane Katrina in 2005. Most notably from my fellow supporters of Celtic FC throughout the world. I discovered Kiva through the Global Hoops Celtic Supporters Club. As Celtic FC was formed in 1888 with the goal of alleviating poverty in Glasgow's East End, it makes sense for Celtic supporters to try an do what they can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the controller for a small family business in Louisiana. I run payroll, do the taxes, and pay the bills among other things.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: People need the opportunities I took (and take) for granted
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computers for a mobile phone company

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's not my money to hoard. I trust it will be used much more effectively in the hands of small entrepreneurs across the world than in my possession.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying sociology at Eastern Mennonite University

lender.name: Carel & Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit of people taking responsibility for wealth in their own hands

lender.name: Star
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all responsible for each other and we are all connected. We are all brothers and sisters and the world is a lot smaller than it seems!
lender.occupational_info: I create artwork for the biopharma community using computer programs specifically for design.

lender.name: jason
lender.loan_because: I love our world, and i want it to be healthier and stronger.
lender.occupational_info: i use precision machinery and tools to cut metal, and quite often myself.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to affect and change the lives of people who don't have the leisures that I do in my own life

lender.name: Barbara J.
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: Matthew 22:37-39
lender.occupational_info: I price health insurance plans in select geographies of the US that are sold to small businesses.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Glass artist

lender.name: Eloi duguay
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrpreneurs in need of capitals. I was there before, know the feeling
lender.occupational_info: Being retired from business, I now help with Habitat For Humanity, building home for the people in need.This is very rewarding, helping other, even stangers you don't even know is the more unselfish act you could do.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: It is good to be of service to others.
lender.occupational_info: Recent graduate, currently unemployed.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do it for me.
lender.occupational_info: I help children to become better people.

lender.name: Market Street Traders
lender.loan_because: We can. We want to spread the word about Kiva and the great work they are doing. We started a lending group and are trying to set up several in our local schools to teach the kids about micro lending and fair trade merchandise.
lender.occupational_info: We own a retail store and cafe that sells only fair trade merchandise. We opened the cafe so we could sell fair trade coffee and serve fair trade wine. We make our own fudge using fair trade chocolate.

lender.name: Amit
lender.loan_because: it gives me immense satisfaction to see people fight against all odds to try to stand up on their feet. I feel that for these kind of people, we should always let our hearts and wallet remain open.

lender.name: lisa castagnozzi
lender.loan_because: I wish to fund individual projects directly
lender.occupational_info: I work to educate Americans on the importance of conscious consumerism. We can change the world in small ways by being conscious of the impacts of our purchasing power.

lender.name: Adrienne Gent
lender.loan_because: I received this as a wedding gift, and it's been the most joyful gift to receive, because I love being able to re-lend to people who need the help, and who do such great work.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I care about people other than myself. My goal in life is to help as many people as I can because to me, that makes life worth living.

lender.name: Suneeta
lender.loan_because: I like helping people that are motivated to help themselves and are not afraid of hard work.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help my company make smart business decisions overseas

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make the computer systems at a bank run.

lender.name: Yasminda
lender.loan_because: I want to end world hunger by giving everyone a means to earn a living.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small college. I request grants of money to implement college programs.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: My life has been very blessed and remains so. I loan to give back to those who desire to empower themselves, yet lack the means to do so. To assist my fellow brothers and sisters on this Earth who are in need. For in reality, we are all one big family. The Divine has blessed me and so I desire to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work as a waiter in a restaurant in the town where I live. I also have an eBay store where I sell items for others. I also am creating my own organic garden so I can grow my own healthy food. I am also a healer assisting others with the training I have been given. I am also a student who loves to learn new subjects of interest. I also enjoy working with my hands, by tapping into my creativity, and use this to create beauty, not only around my home, but in the world. I am an inventor. I am a deeply Spiritual individual and believe we are all connected as one family on this Earth. I respect all cultures and indigenous people - knowing they have a tremendous amount of knowledge and wisdom that can benefit mankind. I love Mother Nature and feel a deep connection to her and seek, in my own way, to heal our environment. I now am looking for ways to give back to others in need to help and assist them, for my life has been very blessed compared with millions of my fellow brothers and sisters.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: US does so much damage in the world--I'd like to counter that a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I write novels.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: This seems like a way to truly help people become more independent.
lender.occupational_info: I own a service company that does heating & air conditioning, electrical, and plumbing work for businesses and homeowners.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: Even with all the ups and downs that we all experience in our lives, I feel truly blessed. My mother always taught me "there, but for the grace of god...." It only takes a little bit to help a lot.
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare safety net strategy consultant

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: We are one world and our love for others moves us all forward...

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I love to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I motivate others to reach their goals.

lender.name: sun
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Freeman LaFleur
lender.loan_because: It gives me a warm fuzzy feeling! I would like to see others prosper as I have with the help of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 20 year old Student and Internet Entrepreneur. I study Graphic Design and I have multiple websites specializing in Social Marketing

lender.name: Brandie
lender.loan_because: It is a small way I can help someone in a less fortunate situation to really change their life. In turn, they will help their families and others.

lender.name: Frieda
lender.loan_because: I admire the ingenuity and hard work of the entrepenuers listed here. I feel inspired to support their efforts as I can. It challenges me to be more thoughtful in the way I take care of my family. I look forward to hearing about the successes of the people I loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I am the minister of a Unitarian Universalist church.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a daycare center.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Running a business in any part of the world is a challenge, and the chance to help out other small business owners in an area where help often isn't available is a wonderful opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I make and sell homemade dog food that enhances the quality of life for dogs.

lender.name: 3rd hour Sociology
lender.loan_because: We change lives here in 601
lender.occupational_info: We explore the cultures of others

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small businesses to transform their communities. Working for yourself is an empowering thing. Small businesses are the heart of any healthy community and need to be encouraged.
lender.occupational_info: I have been designing affordable websites for small business owners since 1995.

lender.name: Jason
lender.occupation: CEO of Real McCoy Fantasy Sports, Inc

lender.name: Lizanne
lender.loan_because: Since I can help, I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic setting.

lender.name: Ethan & Isaac
lender.loan_because: We are learning about saving, sharing and using our resources to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Growing up

lender.name: A. John
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student majoring in International Business with a focus on Asia. I live in San Diego where the surf is great all year round. Cheers

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a fair chance of breaking free from poverty. By loaning some of my money I am hopping that I can help a few people doing just that.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I can see the direct impact of my loan on the life of another person. It is very tangible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student. I study Spanish, and I plan to go to Physical Therapy school. I am currently studying in Argentina, and would like to return here some day to work.

lender.name: Lacy & Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising to builders and developers who want to sell the houses they have built.
